name: Wavebreaker's Fin
desc: A naginata forged from luminescent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.
skill_desc: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12%. A maximum of 40% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.
